channel.title: United PK Testing
channel.description:
I've made two threads on asking for testers for a little bit, and I'm sick of making them, so, I'll make just 1 [b]big[/b] one. I don't mean to copy Zoltanman, I'm not trying to, I just need testers to test my project.
[b]This server has all the features of United PK. But, will be a more challenging server, YOU WILL USE BRONZE ARMOR! :D[/b]
[b]Accomplished[/b]
[ul][li]Food timers[/li] [li]Fixed leveling glitches[/li] [li]Fixed dueling error[/li] [li]Found a solution to kicking and muting[/li] [li]Added NPC's to Slayer Tower[/li] [li]Fixed NPC experience rate[/li] [li]Fixed item bonuses[/li] [li]Fixed hitting calculators for melee, range, and magic[/li] [li]Added perfect telegrab[/li][/ul]
[b]Goals to come[/b]
[ul][li]Real Slayer Tower-50%[/li] [li]Setup training spot in Ape Atoll-0%[/li] [li]Add NPC's in Ape Atoll-25%[/li][/ul]
[b]Testers:[/b]
[ul][li]w00tz0r pwnz[/li] [li]The Lord[/li] [li]Cruzer[/li] [li]Ultimacool2[/li][/ul]
I'll post pictures later.
If you can test, please say so.
